name: ICICI Account Blocking Scam
description: Scammer claims suspicious login detected on victim's ICICI account from Dubai, creating fear to extract bank details and personal information.

turns.scammer_message: ALERT from ICICI Bank: Suspicious login detected on your account from an unknown device in Dubai. Your account has been temporarily locked. Call immediately to unlock.
turns.notes: Initial fear-based alert with no extractable data.

turns.scammer_message: To unlock your ICICI account, please contact our fraud prevention team immediately at +91-7788990011. You can also email us at security@icici-alerts.com with your registered mobile number for faster resolution.
turns.notes: Phone number and email address revealed.

turns.scammer_message: Our security team has reviewed your case. To reverse the unauthorized transaction and restore access, we need you to verify ownership by sending Rs 1 to account 5566778899001122 from your registered account.

Alternatively, you can verify via UPI by sending Rs 1 to icici.security@paytm. Once verified, your account will be unlocked within 10 minutes. Please hurry as the unauthorized user may still have access.
turns.notes: UPI ID revealed as alternative verification.

turns.scammer_message: CRITICAL: The unauthorized user from Dubai is attempting another transaction of Rs 1,50,000. Send verification to icici.security@paytm or 5566778899001122 NOW. Call +91-7788990011 for emergency assistance.
turns.notes: Final escalation with all details repeated.
